enter_shortid: Please enter the shortid of Coolding
name: Name
dragdrop_cooldingcommandon: Drag here your Coolding Command when it should go <u>ON</u>.
dragdrop_cooldingcommandoff: Drag here your Coolding Command when it should go <u>OFF</u>.
licensemissing:
Missing Source license feature.
Please purchase the Event scripting / Web server License feature key at your local reseller.
dragdrop_cooldingcommandecoon: Drag the Coolding Command that will run when the temperature is <u>above</u> setpoint.
dragdrop_cooldingcommandecooff: Drag the Coolding Command that will run when the temperature is <u>below</u> setpoint.
writepermissions: Cannot write file, please check the Plugwise Source permissions. Select 'Run this program as administrator'.
is_in_use_choose: is in use now. You can choose to
switch_seperate_piece: The Switch has two seperated pieces. You can define which piece will run what command.
calendar_return: Please close this window to return to the main screen
calendar_give_name: Give a name for the calendar
error_not_found: The MAC-address, UUID or shortid can not be found. This could be due to a problem with your Internet connection.
invalid_id: The MAC-address, UUID or shortid is not valid.
error_empty_id: The MAC-address, UUID or shortid can not be empty.
